# Harlan A Nelson

::: {.lead}
Senior Data Scientist | Healthcare Analytics | R Practitioner
:::

I build machine learning models that help clinicians understand patient risk. With 15+ years in healthcare data, I work at the intersection of clinical knowledge and modern analytics -- turning complex EHR data into actionable insight.

:::

::: {.highlight-cards}

::: {.highlight-card}
### [Healthcare ML](projects/scd-mortality.qmd)
Building mortality prediction models and risk stratification systems for sickle cell disease using random forests, SHAP, and external validation across health systems.
:::

::: {.highlight-card}
### [R & Tidymodels](skills.qmd)
Deep practitioner of the modern R ecosystem -- tidyverse, tidymodels, targets pipelines, Quarto documents. I teach and mentor others in these tools.
:::

### [Knowledge Systems](ontology/index.qmd)
Exploring how typed knowledge graphs can organize analytical reasoning -- from clinical research ontologies to this website's own structure.

Peer-reviewed work in hepatocellular carcinoma epidemiology, respiratory screening tools, and hospital quality measurement.
